body:
It’s simple really 

I’ve seen so many people have someone else tie their tie in places where ties are required or worst of all, use a fake zip up tie or a clip on tie.

Do people not feel shame having someone else tie their tie?

Do they lack the fathers to teach them such an easy skill?
body_html:
It’s simple really

Do people not feel shame having someone else tie their tie?

Do they lack the fathers to teach them such an easy skill?
title: Your not a man if you can’t tie a tie

body:
I won't wear a tie under any circumstances. They're ugly and they're stupid. "Oh, I think I'll just tie a piece of fabric around my neck." What the fuck? Why? To hide the buttons? Were the buttons *bothering* anybody?

They're just fucking ridiculous. They're the traditional garb of a dying culture. Pretty soon they'll go the way of lederhosen.

They're just fucking ridiculous. They're the traditional garb of a dying culture. Pretty soon they'll go the way of lederhosen.

body:
I mean it’s a step in the right direction of a father 

If you don’t your children how to tie a tie your basically a certified man child 

That kid is gonna be wearing clip on ties because of you 

Do you realize the extreme shame that’s just ambient once people realize someone was wearing a clip on tie to an event.

“Hey what does your tie look weir- it’s a clip on... 😐”

There’s just a noticeable disappointment around people who are discovered to be wearing clip on ties 

Also suits are pretty cool

body:
Suits *are* pretty cool. You've got a matching outfit specifically tailored to your body. The jacket has a shape that idealizes your body; the pants are part of the outfit and not just some all-purpose jeans lazily pulled out of a drawer.

Pair it with some comfortable shoes, and remove the stupid strip of fabric hanging from your neck for no reason, and you've got yourself a pretty killer outfit.

We can certainly agree that clip-on ties are dumb. Fastening a pointless strip of fabric to your collar is every bit as idiotic as tying it around your neck.
body_html:
Suits are pretty cool. You've got a matching outfit specifically tailored to your body. The jacket has a shape that idealizes your body; the pants are part of the outfit and not just some all-purpose jeans lazily pulled out of a drawer.

Pair it with some comfortable shoes, and remove the stupid strip of fabric hanging from your neck for no reason, and you've got yourself a pretty killer outfit.

We can certainly agree that clip-on ties are dumb. Fastening a pointless strip of fabric to your collar is every bit as idiotic as tying it around your neck.
